Description.Name: The Hack Shack
Description.Details: You round the corner in one of the corridors of the Argo and collide with Yang, spilling paperwork and datapads onto the floor, "Oh, sorry Boss! I was just coming to find you." "No worries, Yang," you say as you stoop to help pick up the fallen items. "What do you need?" Yang hands you the datapad he was carrying, "Boss, we have had someone from [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]] reach out regarding our enquiry about removing the bio-lock on [[DEAD_MW,{DEAD_MW.Callsign}]]'s Minsk." You take the offered datapad and scroll through the information, "So they want to send a tech over to work their magic. It doesn't say how much it'll cost us?" Yang coughs, and mumbles something incoherrant. "What was that again?" you say. Yang clears his throat this time and repeats, "They wouldn't say specifically, but they hinted at ¢2,500,000 to remove the bio-locks."

Description.Name: The Hacker
Description.Details: You hand the datapad back to Yang, "Thanks for your hard work on this Yang. Get in touch with them and let's get this Minsk back up and running properly." Yang takes the datapad smiling, "I'm on it, Boss!" You can hear him whistling as he heads back towards the MechBay. Later on, a knock on your office door announces Yang's arrival, "Boss, the job's done. Last Rites can now be piloted by anyone with Mech experience." You smile, "That is good news indeed. So how much did it cost in the end?" Yang glances down at the datapad he's holding, "Final bill came in at ¢2,400,000 C-Bills." You wince, "Ouch! Well, at least it was still less than they hinted at. Anything else I need to know?" Yang nods, "Yeah, Boss. The unlocked Last Rites won't be up to the same tier level performance that [[DEAD_MW,{DEAD_MW.Callsign}]] was able to get out of it."

Description.Name: Collector
Description.Details: You read over the information on the datapad before ultimately shaking your head, "You know what Yang? Thanks for your efforts, but I'm really leaning towards selling that mech. Can you hook us up with one of those collector types you mentioned before?" Yang retrieves his datapad from you, "Sure thing Boss. I'll let you know if any of them get in touch with us." Spend time in Star Systems that have RECREATION tags to see if you are approached by a Collector

Description.Name: Scrapyard
Description.Details: You stare at the datapad before ultimately shaking your head, "You know what Yang? Thanks for your efforts, but the more I dwell on this the more I'd just rather scrap the Minsk and be done with it. Let's have another round and you can organise scrapping that mech tomorrow." Yang smiles, "You got it Boss." EVENT COMPLETED: STORE OR SCRAP LAST RITES MINSK AS YOU SEE FIT
